Package project.capstone.Controller

Class BooksController

java.lang.Object
project.capstone.Controller.BooksController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/books") @CrossOrigin public class BooksController extends Object
Controller class for managing operations related to books.

  • Method Details

    • addNewBooks

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO> addNewBooks(@RequestBody project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO booksDTO)
      Endpoint to add a new book.
      Parameters:
      booksDTO - The DTO object representing the book to add.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the saved BooksDTO with HTTP status CREATED.

    • bulkUpload

      @PostMapping("/bulkupload") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO>> bulkUpload(@RequestBody List<project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO> booksDTOs)
      Endpoint to perform bulk upload of books.
      Parameters:
      booksDTOs - List of BooksDTO objects to upload.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of saved BooksDTOs with HTTP status CREATED.

    • getAllBooks

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO>> getAllBooks()
      Endpoint to retrieve all books.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of BooksDTOs with HTTP status OK.

    • findBookById

      @GetMapping("/find/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO> findBookById(@PathVariable("id") String bookId)
      Endpoint to find a book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book to find.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the found BooksDTO with HTTP status OK.

    • updateBooks

      @PutMapping("/update/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO> updateBooks(@PathVariable("id") String bookId, @RequestBody project.capstone.DTO.BooksDTO booksDTO)
      Endpoint to update a book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book to update.
      booksDTO - The updated information in BooksDTO format.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated BooksDTO with HTTP status OK.

    • deleteBookById

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteBookById(@PathVariable("id") String bookId)
      Endpoint to delete a book by its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message and HTTP status OK.

    • getAllCategories

      @GetMapping("/categories") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> getAllCategories()
      Endpoint to retrieve all categories of books.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of categories with HTTP status OK.
